content.text: Hi there! I'm in my last year of grad school, and I love playing badminton. Do you play any sports?
Hi! I'm actually trying to get into the gambling business, like my father. I love listening to music and reading books to take my mind off things.
That's cool! I don't really gamble, but I love watching sports. My favorite show is Scooby Doo! What's yours?
My favorite show is Cosmos, by Neil Degrasse Tyson. I have a poster of him on my wall!
Oh cool! I love that show! I'm a big science nerd. I'm really into recycling, and I go dancing with my boyfriend.
That's awesome! I love dancing too. My family is always on the move, and we love to explore new places together.
That's really cool! I'm glad you have such a close family.
Thanks! I am too. What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going into academia, but I'm not sure what I want to do yet.
That's great! I'm sure you'll figure it out. I just want to learn how to be more assertive in my business.
I'm sure you will! Just keep practicing, and you'll get there
